name: CosmoDrive: Zero
description:
CosmoDrive: Zero is a minimalistic low-poly style runner-type game. You’re taking control of a fighter, making its way to the portal. Get through the levels, avoiding different obstacles, and maybe you’ll be able to escape this mysterious world.
Features:
• Thematic types of maps
• Random level generation (you have the ability to generate the level yourself)
• Fast gameplay.
